description: Create, update or delete a subnet within a given virtual network. Allows setting and updating the address prefix CIDR, which must be valid within the context of the virtual network. Use the azure_rm_networkinterface module to associate interfaces with the subnet and assign specific IP addresses.

virtual_network_name.description: Name of an existing virtual network with which the subnet is or will be associated.

ad_user.description: Active Directory username. Use when authenticating with an Active Directory user rather than service principal.

secret.description: Azure client secret. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.

security_group_name.description: Name of an existing security group with which to associate the subnet.

state.description: Assert the state of the subnet. Use 'present' to create or update a subnet and 'absent' to delete a subnet.

client_id.description: Azure client ID. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.

address_prefix_cidr.description: CIDR defining the IPv4 address space of the subnet. Must be valid within the context of the virtual network.

password.description: Active Directory user password. Use when authenticating with an Active Directory user rather than service principal.

tenant.description: Azure tenant ID. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.
